original_text: The statue's legs were made from iron. Its feet had parts made from iron and parts made from clay.
korean_text: 그 종아리는 쇠요 그 발은 얼마는 쇠요 얼마는 진흙이었나이다

sentences.original_text: The statue's legs were made from iron
Its feet had parts made from iron
sentences.korean_translation: 그 발은 철로 만들어진 부분이 있었습니다
